rationale: Assessed as Least Concern due to its fairly large distribution and the lack of any known major widespread threats. Though peat swamps are threatened, B. bellica is able occupy other habitats, and establish new populations, even in polluted rivers, as shown in the Dominican Republic.
assessor: Jenkins, A., Kullander, F.F. & Tan, H.H.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
